Text:

2) DVD9 7.64GB

Pls help me, I want the highest possible quality of this movie, so which one should I download ?

Waiting for the reply, thx
@ arnold991 : THE 1080P IS RIPPED FROM THE DVD9 SOURCE. SO THE QUALITY OF THE DVD WILL BE RETAINED IN IT. SO THE BEST THING WOULD BE TO DOWNLOAD THE ORIGINAL DVD ITSELF.
